name: Loom
description: Project and task management MCP server backed by a local SQLite database. Manage projects, tasks, problems, goals, outcomes, and task notes.
author: Jake Nelson

tools.name: create_project
tools.description: Create a new project in Loom

tools.name: list_projects
tools.description: List all projects in Loom

tools.name: get_project
tools.description: Get details of a specific project

tools.name: update_project
tools.description: Update an existing project

tools.name: delete_project
tools.description: Delete a project and all its tasks

tools.name: create_task
tools.description: Create a new task in a project

tools.name: list_tasks
tools.description: List tasks, optionally filtered by project and/or status

tools.name: get_task
tools.description: Get details of a specific task

tools.name: update_task
tools.description: Update an existing task

tools.name: delete_task
tools.description: Delete a task

tools.name: create_problem
tools.description: Create a new problem with optional project or task links

tools.name: list_problems
tools.description: List problems, optionally filtered by project, task, and status

tools.name: get_problem
tools.description: Get details of a specific problem

tools.name: update_problem
tools.description: Update an existing problem

tools.name: delete_problem
tools.description: Delete a problem

tools.name: create_outcome
tools.description: Create a new outcome connected to a project and optionally a task

tools.name: list_outcomes
tools.description: List outcomes, optionally filtered by project, task, and status

tools.name: get_outcome
tools.description: Get details of a specific outcome

tools.name: update_outcome
tools.description: Update an existing outcome

tools.name: delete_outcome
tools.description: Delete an outcome

tools.name: create_goal
tools.description: Create a goal with optional project or task links

tools.name: list_goals
tools.description: List goals, optionally filtered by project, task, and goal type

tools.name: get_goal
tools.description: Get details of a specific goal

tools.name: update_goal
tools.description: Update an existing goal

tools.name: delete_goal
tools.description: Delete a goal

tools.name: create_task_note
tools.description: Create a note on a task

tools.name: list_task_notes
tools.description: List notes for a task

tools.name: get_task_note
tools.description: Get details of a specific task note

tools.name: update_task_note
tools.description: Update an existing task note

tools.name: delete_task_note
tools.description: Delete a task note

db_path.title: Database Path
db_path.description: Custom path for the Loom SQLite database file. Defaults to ~/.loom/loom.db if not set.
